description: Tonight we get to formally meet Vic -- although you've technically been introduced to him (all of him!) already!The strapping 5'10' guy is 21-years old and weighs a solid 180 lbs. He's got muscles in all the right places, and rippling abs that you could do your laundry on. He's a midwestern boy with a great smile and a friendly disposition.He says he was 'nervous at first' to come in, but that all changed recently, and Mike was able to lure him in for a video. By the end of his solo scene -- which he filmed before his hardcore duo with Drew from the other day -- Vic says he's totally game to come back and do more.If you like your men with dark features, a perfect chest, a little bit of chest hair, some tattoos -- then Vic is your guy.
title: Vic - Solo
